import "./Settings.scss"; import zone from "./img/zone.png"; import movement from "./img/movement.png"; import Movement from "./Movement/Movement"; import Zone from "./Zone/Zone"; import { useState } from "react"; const Settings = (props) => { const [cur_cmp, setCmp] = useState(0) const cmps = [ , ] const [zone_settings, setZone] = useState({ culture: "Зерно", start_pos: {x: "", y: ""}, angle: 0, line_spacing: 1, is_return: true }) return

Настройка полетного задания

{cmps[cur_cmp]}
} export default Settings
